function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential over-reliance on AI for disease diagnosis and patient positioning, leading to reduced human oversight and interaction","Impact":"Increased risk of misdiagnosis and patient mismanagement, as well as reduced patient care and empathy","Mitigation":"Strict guidelines for human oversight and verification of AI-generated results, as well as continuous training and education for healthcare workers","Technologies":"AI algorithms for disease diagnosis and patient positioning, as well as communication and monitoring systems for remote patient care","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on cross-population train/test-based AI models for virus detection","Impact":"Potential lack of accuracy and effectiveness in detecting region-specific virus strains, leading to inadequate containment and response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Development and validation of region-specific AI models, as well as collaboration and data-sharing between countries for model training","Technologies":"AI-based virus detection models, data-sharing platforms, and international collaboration platforms","People":"Healthcare researchers, public health agencies, and government authorities","Owner":"International health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Utilization of deep-learning prediction models for risk stratification in resource-limited settings","Impact":"Unintended consequences of misclassification and prioritization of patient care, leading to potentially harmful outcomes and resource misallocation","Mitigation":"Validation and verification of prediction models in diverse settings, as well as continuous monitoring and adjustment based on real-world outcomes","Technologies":"Deep-learning prediction models, real-time monitoring systems, and decision support tools","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, and public health administrators","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and regulatory agencies"}]}
